cause.description:
The Children First Foundation (CFF) is a not-for profit organisation. Young children from around the world are brought over to Australia, where the inspiring Moira Kelly supports them through life saving operations, so that they can once again, return home with an increased lifestyle.
1. Health care is a right of every child
cause.mission: Help children in 3rd countries get the medical attention they require.
cause.name: Children First Foundation
